snippet: A student protest at the University of Mississippi against the re-election of President Obama turned disorderly on Wednesday morning, with some students chanting racial epithets.
abstract: Student protest at University of Mississippi over the re-election of Pres Barack Obama turns disorderly, with some students chanting racial epithets and two arrested for disorderly conduct; university recently marked the 50th anniversary of the riots that followed its racial desegregation, and in recent years has addressed complaints of racial insensitivity on campus.
lead_paragraph: A student protest at the University of Mississippi against the re-election of President Obama turned disorderly on Wednesday morning, with some students chanting racial epithets.

headline.seo: Anti-Obama Protest at University of Mississippi Turns Unruly
headline.main: Anti-Obama Protest at Ole Miss Turns Unruly
headline.print_headline: Anti-Obama Protest at Ole Miss Turns Unruly
